com.base.engine

Class TextRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.base.engine.TextRenderer

  • public class TextRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    Text renderer renders a string into a renderable object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextRenderer(java.lang.String words, int width, int height, boolean center, int font, boolean typewriter, float x, float y)
      Creates a new text box to render the text

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getIsOver()
      Returns whether or not the text is fully displayed
      boolean pauseTypewriterDelay()
      Stops the typewriter delay
      void render()
      Renders all of the characters

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextRenderer

        public TextRenderer(java.lang.String words,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    boolean center,
                    int font,
                    boolean typewriter,
                    float x,
                    float y)
        Creates a new text box to render the text
        Parameters:
        words - The words to be printed
        width - The width of the text box
        height - The height of the text box
        center - boolean if center text
        font - The size of the font (1 = small, 2 = medium, 3 = large) default to medium
        typewriter - Whether or not we are in typewriter mode
        x - X coord of box
        y - Y coord of box

    • Method Detail

      • setSpeed

        public boolean setSpeed(int speed)
        Sets the text speed
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed at which the text should be written (1 = fast, 3 = slow)
        Returns:
        true if in typewriter mode and speed is within [1, 3], false if not

      • startTypewriterDelay

        public boolean startTypewriterDelay()
        Starts the typewriter delay
        Returns:
        true if in typewriter mode, false if not

      • pauseTypewriterDelay

        public boolean pauseTypewriterDelay()
        Stops the typewriter delay
        Returns:
        true if in typewriter mode, false if not

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the text renderer

      • render

        public void render()
        Renders all of the characters

      • getIsOver

        public boolean getIsOver()
        Returns whether or not the text is fully displayed

        whether or not the text is fully displayed
